data.name: para
data.content: Significant figures are the digits in a number that carry meaningful information about its precision.

data.name: para
data.content: In measurements, not all digits are equally reliable. Significant figures help us show how precise a measurement is.

data.name: bullet
data.content: Zeros between non-zero digits are significant.

data.name: bullet
data.content: Trailing zeros in decimals are significant.

data.name: para
data.content: 25.3 has 3 significant figures. 0.0045 has 2 significant figures. 2005 has 4 significant figures. 3.200 has 4 significant figures.

data.name: para
data.content: When rounding, look at the digit after the required place. If it is 5 or more, round up. If it is less than 5, keep the digit unchanged.

data.name: bullet
data.content: Always match significant figures in final answers.
